org.jboss.windup.rules.apps.java.reporting.freemarker

Class GetPrettyPathForFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jboss.windup.rules.apps.java.reporting.freemarker.GetPrettyPathForFile
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    freemarker.template.TemplateMethodModel, freemarker.template.TemplateMethodModelEx, freemarker.template.TemplateModel, WindupFreeMarkerMethod

    public class GetPrettyPathForFile
extends Object
implements WindupFreeMarkerMethod
    Returns a pretty path for the provided file. If the File appears to represent a Java File, this will attempt to determine the associated Java Class and return the name formatted as a package and class (eg, com.package.Foo). Called as follows: getPrettyPathForFile(fileModel)
    Author:
    jsightler
